overview:
Mr. Alain Hanover has over 30 years of experience in venture capital, executive management, software development, and engineering. He has served as CEO for over 15 years at InCert and Viewlogic, as well as being an early stage investor or advisor in over 20 private companies. He also co-founded CommonAngels, Boston’s leading Angel Investor group.

Hanover has served as Managing Director and CEO of NTV since 2002 and was responsible for the investment in all portfolio companies, along with Rana Gupta, now CEO of HistoRx, a portfolio investment. NTV always has led or co-led the first round of financing in most portfolio companies. As part of the investment process, deep due diligence and technical evaluations of all companies was necessary, utilizing experts from Draper Laboratory, as well as negotiation of terms for investment. Following up on its investments, NTV always obtained a Board seat to continue to counsel and strategize with each portfolio company’s management team.
